member.name: T:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel
member.summary: Implements MEF Attributed Programming Model. Documentation is available at https://bitbucket.org/dadhi/dryioc/wiki/MefAttributedModel.

member.name: F:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.DefaultReuse
member.summary: Default reuse policy is Singleton, as in MEF.

member.name: F:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.SupportedReuseTypes
member.summary: Map of supported reuse types: so the reuse type specified by could be mapped to corresponding members.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.WithMefAttributedModel(DryIoc.Rules)
member.summary: Returns new rules with attributed model importing rules appended.
member.param: Source rules to append importing rules to.
member.returns: New rules with attributed model rules.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.WithMefAttributedModel(DryIoc.IContainer)
member.summary: Appends attributed model rules to passed container.
member.param: Source container to apply attributed model importing rules to.
member.returns: Returns new container with new rules.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.RegisterExports(DryIoc.IRegistrator,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type})
member.summary: Registers implementation type(s) with provided registrator/container. Expects that implementation type are annotated with , or .
member.param: Provides types to peek exported implementation types from.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.RegisterExports(DryIoc.IRegistrator,System.Type[])
member.summary: Registers implementation type(s) with provided registrator/container. Expects that implementation type are annotated with , or .

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.RegisterExports(DryIoc.IRegistrator,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: First scans () provided assemblies to find types annotated with , or . Then registers found types into registrator/container.
member.param: Provides assemblies to scan for exported implementation types.
member.remarks: In case of try get type with .

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.RegisterExports(DryIoc.IRegistrator,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.ExportedRegistrationInfo})
member.summary: Registers new factories into registrator/container based on provided registration info's, which is serializable DTO for registration.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.RegisterInfo(DryIoc.IRegistrator,DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.ExportedRegistrationInfo)
member.summary: Registers factories into registrator/container based on single provided info, which could contain multiple exported services with single implementation.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.Scan(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: Scans assemblies to find concrete type annotated with , or attributes, and create serializable DTO with all information required for registering of exported types.
member.returns: Lazy collection of registration info DTOs.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.GetRegistrationInfoOrDefault(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates registration info DTO for provided type. To find this info checks type attributes: , or . If type is not concrete or is value type, then return null.
member.param: Type to convert into registration info.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModel.GetReuse(DryIocAttributes.ReuseType,System.String)
member.summary: Returns reuse object by mapping provided type to . Returns null (transient or no reuse) if null provided reuse type.
member.param: Reuse type to find in supported.
(optional) Reuse name to match with scope name.

member.name: T:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.Error
member.summary: Defines error codes and messages for .

member.name: F:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.Error.Messages
member.summary: Error messages for corresponding codes.

member.name: F:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.Error.FirstErrorCode
member.summary: Codes are starting from this value.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.Error.GetMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns message by provided error code.

member.name: T:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModelException
member.summary: Specific exception type to be thrown by MefAttributedModel extension. Check for possible error cases.

member.name: M:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.AttributedModelException.Of(DryIoc.ErrorCheck,System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates exception by wrapping and with message corresponding to code.
member.param: Error code to wrap, for codes defined.

member.name: T:DryIoc.MefAttributedModel.PrintCode
member.summary: Converts provided literal into valid C# code. Used for generating registration code from DTOs.

member.summary: Prints valid c# Boolean literal: true/false.

member.summary: Prints valid c# string constant.

member.summary: Prints valid c# literal depending of type.

member.summary: Contract type.

member.summary: Full contract type name. Supposed to be used in lazy-loading scenario.

member.summary: Wrapped contract name or service key. It is wrapped in order to be serializable.

member.summary: Default constructor is usually required by deserializer.
